basics.name: Esteban Smith Mutis
basics.label: System engineer student with experience in web development
basics.summary: Computer Systems Engineering student with experience and passion for web development and UI/UX design. I have knowledge in Java (Spring Boot), Node.js, React and Next.js, with which I have developed different personal projects. I specialize in performance optimization and accessibility, creating high-quality user experiences.

profiles.profileTitle: Connect with Esteban Mutis on LinkedIn

experience.name: Bacu
experience.description: Management platform for restaurants and businesses
highlighs: Developed and implemented an online menu system with multi-language support from scratch, integrating internal API with Google Sheets as a translation dictionary, improving the end-user experience.
Optimized performance and user experience across multiple products with React and TypeScript, reducing load times and improving interaction metrics.
Led the progressive migration from JavaScript to TypeScript and implemented reusable CSS styles to replace Tailwind, improving code maintainability.
Implemented Meta Pixel and Google Analytics 4 in the e-commerce platform, establishing tracking for critical events to improve data-driven decision making.
Transitioned from Support and QA Analyst to Frontend Developer over a 3-month period, training new full-time team members who took over my previous responsibilities.
Performed technical diagnostics and end-to-end testing for multiple products (POS, e-commerce, order-in-table, online menu), identifying and resolving critical hardware, software, and network issues.

experience.name: Juan Poloche Campaign
experience.description: Political campaign for the Usaquén council
highlighs: Developed the Juan Poloche's campaign website with a minimalist and responsive design for citizens to access his proposals and work plan.
Contributed to the digital marketing strategy to expand the campaign's reach.
Generated content on social media to inform citizens and conducted metric analysis to assess the campaign's impact, making data-driven decisions.

experience.name: Jóvenes a la U
experience.description: Vocational guidance for students at the Universidad Distrital.
highlighs: Optimized the 'Jóvenes a la U' website for Universidad Distrital students, with a modern and attractive design, facilitating access to information about academic offerings, scholarships, and extracurricular activities.
Significantly improved the user experience through responsive design and intuitive navigation on the 'Jóvenes a la U' website.
